 2122: %% Tests that ?FILE_MODULE:sync/1 at least doesn't crash.
 2123: sync(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2124:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2125:     Sync = filename:join(PrivDir,
 2126: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2127: 			 ++"_sync.fil"),
 2128: 
 2129:     %% Raw open.
 2130:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Sync, [write, raw]),
 2131:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:sync(Fd),
 2132:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2133: 
 2134:     %% Ordinary open.
 2135:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Sync, [write]),
 2136:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:sync(Fd2),
 2137:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2138: 
 2139:     [] = flush(),
 2140:     ok.
 2141: 
 2142: %% Tests that ?FILE_MODULE:advise/4 at least doesn't crash.
 2143: advise(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2144:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2145:     Advise = filename:join(PrivDir,
 2146: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2147: 			   ++"_advise.fil"),
 2148: 
 2149:     Line1 = "Hello\n",
 2150:     Line2 = "World!\n",
 2151: 
 2152:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2153:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd, 0, 0, normal),
 2154:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line1]),
 2155:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line2]),
 2156:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2157: 
 2158:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2159:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd2, 0, 0, random),
 2160:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line1]),
 2161:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line2]),
 2162:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2163: 
 2164:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2165:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd3, 0, 0, sequential),
 2166:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line1]),
 2167:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line2]),
 2168:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2169: 
 2170:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2171:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd4, 0, 0, will_need),
 2172:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line1]),
 2173:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line2]),
 2174:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2175: 
 2176:     {ok, Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2177:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd5, 0, 0, dont_need),
 2178:     ok = io:format(Fd5, "~s", [Line1]),
 2179:     ok = io:format(Fd5, "~s", [Line2]),
 2180:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 2181: 
 2182:     {ok, Fd6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2183:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd6, 0, 0, no_reuse),
 2184:     ok = io:format(Fd6, "~s", [Line1]),
 2185:     ok = io:format(Fd6, "~s", [Line2]),
 2186:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd6),
 2187: 
 2188:     {ok, Fd7} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2189:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd7, 0, 0, bad_advise),
 2190:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd7),
 2191: 
 2192:     %% test write without advise, then a read after an advise
 2193:     {ok, Fd8} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2194:     ok = io:format(Fd8, "~s", [Line1]),
 2195:     ok = io:format(Fd8, "~s", [Line2]),
 2196:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd8),
 2197:     {ok, Fd9} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [read]),
 2198:     Offset = 0,
 2199:     %% same as a 0 length in some implementations
 2200:     Length = length(Line1) + length(Line2),
 2201:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd9, Offset, Length, sequential),
 2202:     {ok, Line1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_line(Fd9),
 2203:     {ok, Line2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_line(Fd9),
 2204:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read_line(Fd9),
 2205:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd9),
 2206: 
 2207:     [] = flush(),
 2208:     ok.
 2209: 
 2210: %% Tests that ?FILE_MODULE:allocate/3 at least doesn't crash.
 2211: allocate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2212:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2213:     Allocate = filename:join(PrivDir,
 2214: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2215: 			     ++"_allocate.fil"),
 2216: 
 2217:     Line1 = "Hello\n",
 2218:     Line2 = "World!\n",
 2219: 
 2220:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2221:     allocate_and_assert(Fd, 1, iolist_size([Line1, Line2])),
 2222:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line1]),
 2223:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line2]),
 2224:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2225: 
 2226:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2227:     allocate_and_assert(Fd2, 1, iolist_size(Line1)),
 2228:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line1]),
 2229:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line2]),
 2230:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2231: 
 2232:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2233:     allocate_and_assert(Fd3, 1, iolist_size(Line1) + 1),
 2234:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line1]),
 2235:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line2]),
 2236:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2237: 
 2238:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2239:     allocate_and_assert(Fd4, 1, 4 * iolist_size([Line1, Line2])),
 2240:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line1]),
 2241:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line2]),
 2242:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2243: 
 2244:     [] = flush(),
 2245:     ok.
 2246: 
 2247: allocate_and_assert(Fd, Offset, Length) ->
 2248:     %% Just verify that calls to ?PRIM_FILE:allocate/3 don't crash or have
 2249:     %% any other negative side effect. We can't really assert against a
 2250:     %% specific return value, because support for file space pre-allocation
 2251:     %% depends on the OS, OS version and underlying filesystem.
 2252:     %%
 2253:     %% The Linux kernel added support for fallocate() in version 2.6.23,
 2254:     %% which currently works only for the ext4, ocfs2, xfs and btrfs file
 2255:     %% systems. posix_fallocate() is available in glibc as of version
 2256:     %% 2.1.94, but it was buggy until glibc version 2.7.
 2257:     %%
 2258:     %% Mac OS X, as of version 10.3, supports the fcntl operation F_PREALLOCATE.
 2259:     %%
 2260:     %% Solaris supports posix_fallocate() but only for the UFS file system
 2261:     %% apparently (not supported for ZFS).
 2262:     %%
 2263:     %% FreeBSD 9.0 is the first FreeBSD release supporting posix_fallocate().
 2264:     %%
 2265:     %% For Windows there's apparently no way to pre-allocate file space, at
 2266:     %% least with same semantics as posix_fallocate(), fallocate() and
 2267:     %% fcntl F_PREALLOCATE.
 2268:     Result = ?FILE_MODULE:allocate(Fd, Offset, Length),
 2269:     case os:type() of
 2270:         {win32, _} ->
 2271:             {error, enotsup} = Result;
 2272:         _ ->
 2273:             _ = Result
 2274:     end.
 2275: 
 2276: %% Tests that asserts that file:allocate/3 changes file size
 2277: allocate_file_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2278:     case os:type() of
 2279:         {unix, darwin} ->
 2280:             do_allocate_file_size(Config);
 2281:         {unix, linux} ->
 2282:             do_allocate_file_size(Config);
 2283:         {win32, _} ->
 2284:             {skip, "Windows does not support file:allocate/3"};
 2285:         _ ->
 2286:             {skip, "Support for allocate/3 is spotty in our test platform at the moment."}
 2287:     end.
 2288: 
 2289: do_allocate_file_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2290:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2291:     Allocate = filename:join(PrivDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_allocate_file"),
 2292: 
 2293:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write]),
 2294:     Result =
 2295:         case ?FILE_MODULE:allocate(Fd, 0, 1024) of
 2296:             ok ->
 2297:                 {ok, 1024} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, eof),
 2298:                 ok;
 2299:             {error, enotsup} ->
 2300:                 {skip, "Filesystem does not support file:allocate/3"}
 2301:           end,
 2302:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2303: 
 2304:     [] = flush(),
 2305:     Result.
 2306: 
 2307: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2308: 
 2309: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2310:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 2311:     Name = filename:join(RootDir,
 2312: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2313: 			 ++"_delete.fil"),
 2314:     {ok, Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, write),
 2315:     io:format(Fd1,"ok.\n",[]),
 2316:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2317:     %% Check that the file is readable
 2318:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, read),
 2319:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2320:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name),
 2321:     %% Check that the file is not readable anymore
 2322:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, read),
 2323:     %% Try deleting a nonexistent file
 2324:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name),
 2325:     Name2 = filename:join(RootDir,
 2326:                           atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2327:                           ++"_delete_2.fil"),
 2328:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, write),
 2329:     io:format(Fd3,"ok.\n",[]),
 2330:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2331:     %% Check that the file is readable
 2332:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, read),
 2333:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2334:     %% Try deleting with the raw option
 2335:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name2, [raw]),
 2336:     %% Check that the file is not readable anymore
 2337:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, read),
 2338:     %% Try deleting a nonexistent file with the raw option
 2339:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name2, [raw]),
 2340: 
 2341:     Name3 = filename:join(RootDir,
 2342:                           atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2343:                           ++"_delete_3.fil"),
 2344:     {ok, Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, write),
 2345:     io:format(Fd5,"ok.\n",[]),
 2346:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 2347:     %% Check that the file is readable
 2348:     {ok, Fd6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, read),
 2349:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd6),
 2350:     %% Try deleting with no option, should be equivalent to delete/1
 2351:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name3, []),
 2352:     %% Check that the file is not readable anymore
 2353:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, read),
 2354:     %% Try deleting a nonexistent file with no option
 2355:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name3, []),
 2356: 
 2357:     [] = flush(),
 2358:     ok.
 2359: 
 2360: rename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2361:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 2362:     FileName1 = atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_rename.fil",
 2363:     FileName2 = atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_rename.ful",
 2364:     Name1 = filename:join(RootDir, FileName1),
 2365:     Name2 = filename:join(RootDir, FileName2),
 2366:     {ok,Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,write),
 2367:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2368:     %% Rename, and check that id really changed name
 2369:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name1,Name2),
 2370:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,read),
 2371:     {ok,Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2,read),
 2372:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2373:     %% Try renaming something to itself
 2374:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name2,Name2),
 2375:     %% Try renaming something that doesn't exist
 2376:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name1,Name2),
 2377:     %% Try renaming to something else than a string
 2378:     {error, badarg} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name1,{foo,bar}),
 2379: 
 2380:     %% Move between directories
 2381:     DirName1 = filename:join(RootDir,
 2382: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2383: 			     ++"_rename_dir"),
 2384:     DirName2 = filename:join(RootDir,
 2385: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2386: 			     ++"_second_rename_dir"),
 2387:     Name1foo = filename:join(DirName1, "foo.fil"),
 2388:     Name2foo = filename:join(DirName2, "foo.fil"),
 2389:     Name2bar = filename:join(DirName2, "bar.dir"),
 2390:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(DirName1),
 2391:     %% The name has to include the full file name, path in not enough
 2392:     expect({error, eisdir}, {error, eexist},
 2393: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name2,DirName1)),
 2394:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name2, Name1foo),
 2395:     %% Now rename the directory
 2396:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(DirName1,DirName2),
 2397:     %% And check that the file is there now
 2398:     {ok,Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2foo, read),
 2399:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2400:     %% Try some dirty things now: move the directory into itself
 2401:     {error, Msg1} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(DirName2, Name2bar),
 2402:     io:format("Errmsg1: ~p",[Msg1]),
 2403:     %% move dir into a file in itself
 2404:     {error, Msg2} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(DirName2, Name2foo),
 2405:     io:format("Errmsg2: ~p",[Msg2]),
 2406: 
 2407:     [] = flush(),
 2408:     ok.
 2409: 
 2410: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2411: 
 2412: names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2413:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 2414:     FileName = "foo1.fil",
 2415:     Name1 = filename:join(RootDir, FileName),
 2416:     Name2 = [RootDir,"/","foo1",".","fil"],
 2417:     Name3 = [RootDir,"/",foo,$1,[[[],[],'.']],"f",il],
 2418:     {ok,Fd0} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,write),
 2419:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd0),
 2420: 
 2421:     %% Try some file names
 2422:     {ok,Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,read),
 2423:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2424:     {ok,Fd2f} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(lists:flatten(Name2),read),
 2425:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2f),
 2426:     {ok,Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2,read),
 2427:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2428:     {ok,Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3,read),
 2429:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2430: 
 2431:     %% Now try the same on raw files.
 2432:     {ok,Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [read, raw]),
 2433:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2434:     {ok,Fd4f} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(lists:flatten(Name2), [read, raw]),
 2435:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4f),
 2436:     {ok,Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, [read, raw]),
 2437:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 2438: 
 2439:     case length(Name1) > 255 of
 2440: 	true ->
 2441: 	    io:format("Path too long for an atom:\n\n~p\n", [Name1]);
 2442: 	false ->
 2443: 	    Name4 = list_to_atom(Name1),
 2444: 	    {ok,Fd6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name4,read),
 2445: 	    ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd6)
 2446:     end,
 2447: 
 2448:     %% Try some path names
 2449:     Path1 = RootDir,
 2450:     Path2 = [RootDir],
 2451:     Path3 = ['',[],[RootDir,[[]]]],
 2452:     {ok,Fd11,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path1],FileName,read),
 2453:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd11),
 2454:     {ok,Fd12,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path2],FileName,read),
 2455:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd12),
 2456:     {ok,Fd13,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path3],FileName,read),
 2457:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd13),
 2458:     case length(Path1) > 255 of
 2459: 	true->
 2460: 	    io:format("Path too long for an atom:\n\n~p\n", [Path1]);
 2461: 	false ->
 2462: 	    Path4 = list_to_atom(Path1),
 2463: 	    {ok,Fd14,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path4],FileName,read),
 2464: 	    ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd14)
 2465:     end,
 2466:     [] = flush(),
 2467:     ok.
 2468: 
 2469: volume_relative_paths(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2470:     case os:type() of
 2471:         {win32, _} ->
 2472:             {ok, [Drive, $: | _]} = file:get_cwd(),
 2473:             %% Relative to current device root.
 2474:             {ok, RootInfo} = file:read_file_info([Drive, $:, $/]),
 2475:             {ok, RootInfo} = file:read_file_info("/"),
 2476:             %% Relative to current device directory.
 2477:             {ok, DirContents} = file:list_dir([Drive, $:]),
 2478:             {ok, DirContents} = file:list_dir("."),
 2479:             [] = flush(),
 2480:             ok;
 2481:         _ ->
 2482:             {skip, "This test is Windows-specific."}
 2483:     end.
 2484: 
 2485: unc_paths(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2486:     case os:type() of
 2487:         {win32, _} ->
 2488:             %% We assume administrative shares are set up and reachable, and we
 2489:             %% settle for testing presence as some of the returned data is
 2490:             %% different.
 2491:             {ok, _} = file:read_file_info("C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe"),
 2492:             {ok, _} = file:read_file_info("\\\\localhost\\c$\\Windows\\explorer.exe"),
 2493: 
 2494:             {ok, Files} = file:list_dir("C:\\Windows\\"),
 2495:             {ok, Files} = file:list_dir("\\\\localhost\\c$\\Windows\\"),
 2496: 
 2497:             {ok, Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2498: 
 2499:             try
 2500:                 ok = file:set_cwd("\\\\localhost\\c$\\Windows\\"),
 2501:                 {ok, _} = file:read_file_info("explorer.exe")
 2502:             after
 2503:                 file:set_cwd(Cwd)
 2504:             end,
 2505: 
 2506:             [] = flush(),
 2507:             ok;
 2508:         _ ->
 2509:             {skip, "This test is Windows-specific."}
 2510:     end.
 2511: 
 2512: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2513: 
 2514: 
 2515: e_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2516:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2517:     Base = filename:join(RootDir,
 2518: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_e_delete"),
 2519:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2520: 
 2521:     %% Delete a non-existing file.
 2522:     {error, enoent} =
 2523: 	?FILE_MODULE:delete(filename:join(Base, "non_existing")),
 2524: 
 2525:     %% Delete a directory.
 2526:     {error, eperm} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Base),
 2527: 
 2528:     %% Use a path-name with a non-directory component.
 2529:     Afile = filename:join(Base, "a_file"),
 2530:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Afile, "hello\n"),
 2531:     {error, E} =
 2532: 	expect({error, enotdir}, {error, enoent}, 
 2533: 	       ?FILE_MODULE:delete(filename:join(Afile, "another_file"))),
 2534:     io:format("Result: ~p~n", [E]),
 2535: 
 2536:     %% No permission.
 2537:     case os:type() of
 2538: 	{win32, _} ->
 2539: 	    %% Remove a character device.
 2540: 	    expect({error, eacces}, {error, einval},
 2541:                    ?FILE_MODULE:delete("nul"));
 2542: 	_ ->
 2543: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(
 2544: 	       Base, #file_info {mode=0}),
 2545: 	    {error, eacces} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Afile),
 2546: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(
 2547: 	       Base, #file_info {mode=8#700})
 2548:     end,
 2549: 
 2550:     [] = flush(),
 2551:     ok.
 2552: 
 2553: %%% FreeBSD gives EEXIST when renaming a file to an empty dir, although the
 2554: %%% manual page can be interpreted as saying that EISDIR should be given.
 2555: %%% (What about FreeBSD? We store our nightly build results on a FreeBSD
 2556: %%% file system, that's what.)
 2557: 
 2558: e_rename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2559:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2560:     Base = filename:join(RootDir,
 2561: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_e_rename"),
 2562:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2563: 
 2564:     %% Create an empty directory.
 2565:     EmptyDir = filename:join(Base, "empty_dir"),
 2566:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(EmptyDir),
 2567: 
 2568:     %% Create a non-empty directory.
 2569:     NonEmptyDir = filename:join(Base, "non_empty_dir"),
 2570:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NonEmptyDir),
 2571:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(
 2572: 	    filename:join(NonEmptyDir, "a_file"),
 2573: 	    "hello\n"),
 2574: 
 2575:     %% Create another non-empty directory.
 2576:     ADirectory = filename:join(Base, "a_directory"),
 2577:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(ADirectory),
 2578:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(
 2579: 	    filename:join(ADirectory, "a_file"),
 2580: 	    "howdy\n\n"),
 2581: 
 2582:     %% Create a data file.
 2583:     File = filename:join(Base, "just_a_file"),
 2584:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(File, "anything goes\n\n"),
 2585: 
 2586:     %% Move an existing directory to a non-empty directory.
 2587:     {error, eexist} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(ADirectory, NonEmptyDir),
 2588: 
 2589:     %% Move a root directory.
 2590:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename("/", "arne"),
 2591: 
 2592:     %% Move Base into Base/new_name.
 2593:     {error, einval} = 
 2594: 	?FILE_MODULE:rename(Base, filename:join(Base, "new_name")),
 2595: 
 2596:     %% Overwrite a directory with a file.
 2597:     expect({error, eexist}, %FreeBSD (?)
 2598: 	   {error, eisdir},
 2599: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(File, EmptyDir)),
 2600:     expect({error, eexist}, %FreeBSD (?)
 2601: 	   {error, eisdir},
 2602: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(File, NonEmptyDir)),
 2603: 
 2604:     %% Move a non-existing file.
 2605:     NonExistingFile = filename:join(Base, "non_existing_file"),
 2606:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(NonExistingFile, NonEmptyDir),
 2607: 
 2608:     %% Overwrite a file with a directory.
 2609:     expect({error, eexist}, %FreeBSD (?)
 2610: 	   {error, enotdir},
 2611: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(ADirectory, File)),
 2612: 
 2613:     %% Move a file to another filesystem.
 2614:     %% XXX - This test case is bogus. We cannot be guaranteed that
 2615:     %%       the source and destination are on 
 2616:     %%       different filesystems.
 2617:     %%
 2618:     %% XXX - Gross hack!
 2619:     Comment = case os:type() of
 2620: 		  {unix, _} ->
 2621: 		      OtherFs = "/tmp",
 2622: 		      NameOnOtherFs = filename:join(OtherFs, filename:basename(File)),
 2623: 		      {ok, Com} = case ?FILE_MODULE:rename(File, NameOnOtherFs) of
 2624: 				      {error, exdev} ->
 2625: 					  %% The file could be in
 2626: 					  %% the same filesystem!
 2627: 					  {ok, ok};
 2628: 				      ok ->
 2629: 					  {ok, {comment,
 2630: 						"Moving between filesystems "
 2631: 						"succeeded, files are probably "
 2632: 						"in the same filesystem!"}};
 2633: 				      {error, eperm} ->
 2634: 					  {ok, {comment, "SBS! You don't "
 2635: 						"have the permission to do "
 2636: 						"this test!"}};
 2637: 				      Else ->
 2638: 					  Else
 2639: 				  end,
 2640: 		      Com;
 2641: 		  {win32, _} ->
 2642: 		      %% At least Windows NT can
 2643: 		      %% successfully move a file to
 2644: 		      %% another drive.
 2645: 		      ok
 2646: 	      end,
 2647:     [] = flush(),
 2648:     Comment.
 2649: 
 2650: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2651: 
 2652: e_make_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2653:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2654:     Base = filename:join(RootDir, 
 2655: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_e_make_dir"),
 2656:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2657: 
 2658:     %% A component of the path does not exist.
 2659:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(filename:join([Base, "a", "b"])),
 2660: 
 2661:     %% Use a path-name with a non-directory component.
 2662:     Afile = filename:join(Base, "a_directory"),
 2663:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Afile, "hello\n"),
 2664:     case ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(
 2665:             filename:join(Afile, "another_directory")) of
 2666:         {error, enotdir} -> io:format("Result: enotdir");
 2667:         {error, enoent} -> io:format("Result: enoent")
 2668:     end,
 2669: 
 2670:     %% No permission (on Unix only).
 2671:     case os:type() of
 2672: 	{win32, _} ->
 2673: 	    ok;
 2674: 	_ ->
 2675: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(Base, #file_info {mode=0}),
 2676: 	    {error, eacces} = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(filename:join(Base, "xxxx")),
 2677: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(
 2678: 	       Base, #file_info {mode=8#700})
 2679:     end,
 2680:     ok.
 2681: 
 2682: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2683: 
 2684: e_del_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2685:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2686:     Base = test_server:temp_name(filename:join(RootDir, "e_del_dir")),
 2687:     io:format("Base: ~p", [Base]),
 2688:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2689: 
 2690:     %% Delete a non-existent directory.
 2691:     {error, enoent} = 
 2692: 	?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(filename:join(Base, "non_existing")),
 2693: 
 2694:     %% Use a path-name with a non-directory component.
 2695:     Afile = filename:join(Base, "a_directory"),
 2696:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Afile, "hello\n"),
 2697:     {error, E1} = expect({error, enotdir}, {error, enoent},
 2698: 			 ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(
 2699: 			    filename:join(Afile, "another_directory"))),
 2700:     io:format("Result: ~p", [E1]),
 2701: 
 2702:     %% Delete a non-empty directory.
 2703:     {error, E2} = expect({error, enotempty}, {error, eexist}, {error, eacces},
 2704: 			 ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(Base)),
 2705:     io:format("Result: ~p", [E2]),
 2706: 
 2707:     %% Remove the current directory.
 2708:     {error, E3} = expect({error, einval}, 
 2709: 			 {error, eperm}, % Linux and DUX
 2710: 			 {error, eacces},
 2711: 			 {error, ebusy},
 2712: 			 ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(".")),
 2713:     io:format("Result: ~p", [E3]),
 2714: 
 2715:     %% No permission.
 2716:     case os:type() of
 2717: 	{win32, _} ->
 2718: 	    ok;
 2719: 	_ ->
 2720: 	    ADirectory = filename:join(Base, "no_perm"),
 2721: 	    ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(ADirectory),
 2722: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info( Base, #file_info {mode=0}),
 2723: 	    {error, eacces} = ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(ADirectory),
 2724: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info( Base, #file_info {mode=8#700})
 2725:     end,
 2726:     [] = flush(),
 2727:     ok.
 2728: 
 2729: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2730: 
 2731: 
 2732: %% Trying reading and positioning from a compressed file.
 2733: 
 2734: read_compressed_cooked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2735:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2736:     Real = filename:join(Data, "realmen.html.gz"),
 2737:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Real, [read,compressed]),
 2738:     try_read_file_list(Fd).
 2739: 
 2740: read_compressed_cooked_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2741:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2742:     Real = filename:join(Data, "realmen.html.gz"),
 2743:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Real, [read,compressed,binary]),
 2744:     try_read_file_binary(Fd).
 2745: 
 2746: %% Trying reading and positioning from an uncompressed file,
 2747: %% but with the compressed flag given.
 2748: 
 2749: read_not_really_compressed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2750:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2751:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2752: 
 2753:     %% The file realmen.html might have got CRs added (by WinZip).
 2754:     %% Remove them, or the file positions will not be correct.
 2755: 
 2756:     Real = filename:join(Data, "realmen.html"),
 2757:     RealPriv = filename:join(Priv,
 2758: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_realmen.html"),
 2759:     {ok, RealDataBin} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file(Real),
 2760:     RealData = remove_crs(binary_to_list(RealDataBin), []),
 2761:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(RealPriv, RealData),
 2762:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(RealPriv, [read, compressed]),
 2763:     try_read_file_list(Fd).
 2764: 
 2765: remove_crs([$\r|Rest], Result) ->
 2766:     remove_crs(Rest, Result);
 2767: remove_crs([C|Rest], Result) ->
 2768:     remove_crs(Rest, [C|Result]);
 2769: remove_crs([], Result) ->
 2770:     lists:reverse(Result).
 2771: 
 2772: try_read_file_list(Fd) ->
 2773:     %% Seek to the current position (nothing should happen).
 2774: 
 2775:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 0),
 2776:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2777: 
 2778:     %% Read a few lines from a compressed file.
 2779: 
 2780:     ShouldBe = "<TITLE>Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n",
 2781:     ShouldBe = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2782: 
 2783:     %% Now seek forward.
 2784: 
 2785:     {ok, 381} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 381),
 2786:     Back = "Back in the good old days -- the \"Golden Era\" " ++
 2787: 	"of computers, it was\n",
 2788:     Back = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2789: 
 2790:     %% Try to search forward relative to the current position.
 2791: 
 2792:     {ok, CurPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2793:     RealPos = 4273,
 2794:     {ok, RealPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, RealPos-CurPos}),
 2795:     RealProg = "<LI> Real Programmers aren't afraid to use GOTOs.\n",
 2796:     RealProg = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2797: 
 2798:     %% Seek backward.
 2799: 
 2800:     AfterTitle = length("<TITLE>"),
 2801:     {ok, AfterTitle} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, AfterTitle),
 2802:     Title = "Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n",
 2803:     Title = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2804: 
 2805:     %% Seek past the end of the file.
 2806: 
 2807:     {ok, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 25000),
 2808: 
 2809:     %% Done.
 2810: 
 2811:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2812:     [] = flush(),
 2813:     ok.
 2814: 
 2815: try_read_file_binary(Fd) ->
 2816:     %% Seek to the current position (nothing should happen).
 2817: 
 2818:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 0),
 2819:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2820: 
 2821:     %% Read a few lines from a compressed file.
 2822: 
 2823:     ShouldBe = <<"<TITLE>Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n">>,
 2824:     ShouldBe = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2825: 
 2826:     %% Now seek forward.
 2827: 
 2828:     {ok, 381} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 381),
 2829:     Back = <<"Back in the good old days -- the \"Golden Era\" "
 2830: 	     "of computers, it was\n">>,
 2831:     Back = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2832: 
 2833:     %% Try to search forward relative to the current position.
 2834: 
 2835:     {ok, CurPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2836:     RealPos = 4273,
 2837:     {ok, RealPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, RealPos-CurPos}),
 2838:     RealProg = <<"<LI> Real Programmers aren't afraid to use GOTOs.\n">>,
 2839:     RealProg = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2840: 
 2841:     %% Seek backward.
 2842: 
 2843:     AfterTitle = length("<TITLE>"),
 2844:     {ok, AfterTitle} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, AfterTitle),
 2845:     Title = <<"Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n">>,
 2846:     Title = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2847: 
 2848:     %% Done.
 2849: 
 2850:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2851:     [] = flush(),
 2852:     ok.
 2853: 
 2854: read_cooked_tar_problem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2855:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2856:     ProblemFile = filename:join(Data, "cooked_tar_problem.tar.gz"),
 2857:     {ok,Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(ProblemFile, [read,compressed,binary]),
 2858: 
 2859:     {ok,34304} = file:position(Fd, 34304),
 2860:     {ok,Bin} = file:read(Fd, 512),
 2861:     512 = byte_size(Bin),
 2862: 
 2863:     {ok,34304+512+1024} = file:position(Fd, {cur,1024}),
 2864: 
 2865:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 2866: 
 2867:     ok.
 2868: 
 2869: 
 2870: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2871: 
 2872: write_compressed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2873:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2874:     MyFile = filename:join(Priv,
 2875: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_test.gz"),
 2876: 
 2877:     %% Write a file.
 2878: 
 2879:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [write, compressed]),
 2880:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 0),
 2881:     Prefix = "hello\n",
 2882:     End = "end\n",
 2883:     ok = io:put_chars(Fd, Prefix),
 2884:     {ok, 143} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 143),
 2885:     ok = io:put_chars(Fd, End),
 2886:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2887: 
 2888:     %% Read the file and verify the contents.
 2889: 
 2890:     {ok, Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [read, compressed]),
 2891:     Prefix = io:get_line(Fd1, ''),
 2892:     Second = lists:duplicate(143-length(Prefix), 0) ++ End,
 2893:     Second = io:get_line(Fd1, ''),
 2894:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2895: 
 2896:     %% Verify successful compression by uncompressing the file
 2897:     %% using zlib:gunzip/1.
 2898: 
 2899:     {ok,Contents} = file:read_file(MyFile),
 2900:     <<"hello\n",0:137/unit:8,"end\n">> = zlib:gunzip(Contents),
 2901: 
 2902:     %% Ensure that the file is compressed.
 2903: 
 2904:     TotalSize = 143 + length(End),
 2905:     case ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(MyFile) of
 2906: 	{ok, #file_info{size=Size}} when Size < TotalSize ->
 2907: 	    ok;
 2908: 	{ok, #file_info{size=Size}} when Size == TotalSize ->
 2909: 	    ct:fail(file_not_compressed)
 2910:     end,
 2911: 
 2912:     %% Write again to ensure that the file is truncated.
 2913: 
 2914:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [write, compressed]),
 2915:     NewString = "aaaaaaaaaaa",
 2916:     ok = io:put_chars(Fd2, NewString),
 2917:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2918:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [read, compressed]),
 2919:     {ok, NewString} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd3, 1024),
 2920:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2921: 
 2922:     %% Done.
 2923: 
 2924:     [] = flush(),
 2925:     ok.
 2926: 
 2927: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2928: 
 2929: catenated_gzips(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2930:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2931:     MyFile = filename:join(Priv, ?MODULE_STRING++"_test.gz"),
 2932: 
 2933:     First = "Hello, all good men going to search parties. ",
 2934:     Second = "Now I really need your help.",
 2935:     All = iolist_to_binary([First|Second]),
 2936:     Cat = [zlib:gzip(First),zlib:gzip(Second)],
 2937: 
 2938:     ok = file:write_file(MyFile, Cat),
 2939: 
 2940:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(MyFile, [read,compressed,binary]),
 2941:     {ok,All} = file:read(Fd, 100000),
 2942:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 2943: 
 2944:     ok.
 2945: 
 2946: 
 2947: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2948: 
 2949: compress_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2950:     DataDir =
 2951: 	filename:dirname(
 2952: 	  filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "x")),
 2953:     DataDirSlash = DataDir++"/",
 2954:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2955: 					[compressed, read]),
 2956:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2957: 					[compressed, read, write]),
 2958:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2959: 					[compressed, read, append]),
 2960:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2961: 					[compressed, write, append]),
 2962:     {error, E1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDir, [compressed, read]),
 2963:     {error, E2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDirSlash, [compressed, read]),
 2964:     {error, E3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDir, [compressed, write]),
 2965:     {error, E4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDirSlash, [compressed, write]),
 2966:     {eisdir,eisdir,eisdir,eisdir} = {E1,E2,E3,E4},
 2967: 
 2968:     %% Read a corrupted .gz file.
 2969: 
 2970:     Corrupted = filename:join(DataDir, "corrupted.gz"),
 2971:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Corrupted, [read, compressed]),
 2972:     {error, eio} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd, 100),
 2973:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2974: 
 2975:     [] = flush(),
 2976:     ok.
 2977: 
 2978: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2979: 
 2980: compress_async_crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2981:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2982:     Path = filename:join(DataDir, "test.gz"),
 2983:     ExpectedData = <<"qwerty">>,
 2984: 
 2985:     _ = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Path),
 2986:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Path, [write, binary, compressed]),
 2987:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd, ExpectedData),
 2988:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2989: 
 2990:     %% Test that when using async thread pool, the emulator doesn't crash
 2991:     %% when the efile port driver is stopped while a compressed file operation
 2992:     %% is in progress (being carried by an async thread).
 2993:     ok = compress_async_crash_loop(10000, Path, ExpectedData),
 2994:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Path),
 2995:     ok.
 2996: 
 2997: compress_async_crash_loop(0, _Path, _ExpectedData) ->
 2998:     ok;
 2999: compress_async_crash_loop(N, Path, ExpectedData) ->
 3000:     Parent = self(),
 3001:     {Pid, Ref} = spawn_monitor(
 3002: 		   fun() ->
 3003: 			   {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(
 3004: 					 Path, [read, compressed, raw, binary]),
 3005: 			   Len = byte_size(ExpectedData),
 3006: 			   Parent ! {self(), continue},
 3007: 			   {ok, ExpectedData} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd, Len),
 3008: 			   ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 3009: 			   receive foobar -> ok end
 3010: 		   end),
 3011:     receive
 3012:         {Pid, continue} ->
 3013:             exit(Pid, shutdown),
 3014:             receive
 3015:                 {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, Reason} ->
 3016:                     shutdown = Reason
 3017:             end;
 3018:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, Reason2} ->
 3019:             ct:fail({worker_exited, Reason2})
 3020:     after 60000 ->
 3021:             exit(Pid, shutdown),
 3022:             erlang:demonitor(Ref, [flush]),
 3023:             ct:fail(worker_timeout)
 3024:     end,
 3025:     compress_async_crash_loop(N - 1, Path, ExpectedData).
 3026: 
 3027: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3028: 
 3029: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3030:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3031:     Name = filename:join(Dir, "data-utf8.txt"),
 3032:     Txt = lists:seq(128, 255),
 3033:     D = unicode:characters_to_binary(Txt, latin1, latin1),
 3034:     {ok,Fd1} =
 3035: 	?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write,read,binary,{encoding,unicode}]),
 3036:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(Fd1),
 3037:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Txt),
 3038:     {ok,0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, bof),
 3039:     {ok,D} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd1, 129),
 3040:     {ok,0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, bof),
 3041:     {ok,D1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd1, 64),
 3042:     {ok,Pos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, cur),
 3043:     {ok,D2} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd1, {cur,0}, 65),
 3044:     D = <<D1/binary, D2/binary>>,
 3045:     {ok,D1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd1, bof, 64),
 3046:     {ok,Pos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, Pos),
 3047:     {ok,D2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd1, 64),
 3048:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 3049:     %%
 3050:     RawD = unicode:characters_to_binary(Txt, latin1, unicode),
 3051:     {ok,RawD} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file(Name),
 3052:     %%
 3053:     {ok,Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read,{encoding,unicode}]),
 3054:     {ok,Txt} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 129),
 3055:     {Txt1,Txt2} = lists:split(64, Txt),
 3056:     {ok,Txt2} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, Pos, 65),
 3057:     {ok,0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd2, bof),
 3058:     {ok,Txt1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 64),
 3059:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2).
 3060:

 3063: %% Test the file:altname/1 function.
 3064: altname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3065:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3066:     NewDir = filename:join(RootDir,
 3067: 			   "long alternative path name with spaces"),
 3068:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NewDir),
 3069:     Name = filename:join(NewDir, "a_file_with_long_name"),
 3070:     ShortName = filename:join(NewDir, "short"),
 3071:     NonexName = filename:join(NewDir, "nonexistent"),
 3072:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Name, "some contents\n"),
 3073:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(ShortName, "some contents\n"),
 3074:     Result =
 3075: 	case ?FILE_MODULE:altname(NewDir) of
 3076: 	    {error, enotsup} ->
 3077: 		{skipped, "Altname not supported on this platform"};
 3078: 	    {ok, "LONGAL~1"} -> 
 3079: 		{ok, "A_FILE~1"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname(Name),
 3080: 		{ok, "c:/"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname("C:/"),
 3081: 		{ok, "c:/"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname("C:\\"),
 3082: 		{error,enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname(NonexName),
 3083: 		{ok, "short"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname(ShortName),
 3084: 		ok
 3085: 	end,
 3086:     [] = flush(),
 3087:     Result.
 3088: 
 3089: 
 3090: %% Test creating a hard link.
 3091: make_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3092:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3093:     NewDir = filename:join(RootDir,
 3094: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 3095: 			   ++"_make_link"),
 3096:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NewDir),
 3097: 
 3098:     Name = filename:join(NewDir, "a_file"),
 3099:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Name, "some contents\n"),
 3100: 
 3101:     Alias = filename:join(NewDir, "an_alias"),
 3102:     Result =
 3103: 	case ?FILE_MODULE:make_link(Name, Alias) of
 3104: 	    {error, enotsup} ->
 3105: 		{skipped, "Links not supported on this platform"};
 3106: 	    ok ->
 3107: 		%% Note: We take the opportunity to test 
 3108: 		%% ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info/1,
 3109: 		%% which should in behave exactly as 
 3110: 		%% ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info/1
 3111: 		%% since they are not used on symbolic links.
 3112: 
 3113: 		{ok, Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name),
 3114:                 {ok,Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name, [raw]),
 3115: 		{ok, Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias),
 3116:                 {ok,Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias, [raw]),
 3117: 		#file_info{links = 2, type = regular} = Info,
 3118: 		{error, eexist} =
 3119: 		    ?FILE_MODULE:make_link(Name, Alias),
 3120: 		ok
 3121: 	end,
 3122: 
 3123:     [] = flush(),
 3124:     Result.
 3125: 
 3126: %% Test that reading link info for an ordinary file or directory works
 3127: %% (on all platforms).
 3128: read_link_info_for_non_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3129:     {ok, #file_info{type=directory}} =
 3130: 	?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info("."),
 3131:     {ok, #file_info{type=directory}} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(".", [raw]),
 3132: 
 3133:     [] = flush(),
 3134:     ok.
 3135: 
 3136: %% Test operations on symbolic links (for Unix).
 3137: symlinks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3138:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link(lists:duplicate(10000,$a)),
 3139:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_all(lists:duplicate(10000,$a)),
 3140:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3141:     NewDir = filename:join(RootDir,
 3142: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 3143: 			   ++"_symlinks"),
 3144:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NewDir),
 3145: 
 3146:     Name = filename:join(NewDir, "a_plain_file"),
 3147:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Name, "some stupid content\n"),
 3148: 
 3149:     Alias = filename:join(NewDir, "a_symlink_alias"),
 3150:     Result =
 3151: 	case ?FILE_MODULE:make_symlink(Name, Alias) of
 3152: 	    {error, enotsup} ->
 3153: 		{skipped, "Links not supported on this platform"};
 3154: 	    {error, eperm} ->
 3155: 		{win32,_} = os:type(),
 3156: 		{skipped, "Windows user not privileged to create symlinks"};
 3157: 	    ok ->
 3158: 		{ok, Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Name),
 3159:                 {ok,Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Name, [raw]),
 3160: 		{ok, Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Alias),
 3161:                 {ok,Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Alias, [raw]),
 3162: 		{ok, Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name),
 3163:                 {ok,Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name, [raw]),
 3164: 		#file_info{links = 1, type = regular} = Info1,
 3165: 
 3166: 		{ok, Info2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias),
 3167:                 {ok,Info2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias, [raw]),
 3168: 		#file_info{links=1, type=symlink} = Info2,
 3169: 		{ok, Name} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link(Alias),
 3170: 		{ok, Name} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_all(Alias),
 3171: 		%% If all is good, delete dir again (avoid hanging dir on windows)
 3172: 		file:del_dir_r(NewDir),
 3173: 		ok
 3174: 	end,
 3175: 
 3176:     [] = flush(),
 3177:     Result.
 3178: 
 3179: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3180: 
 3181: copy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3182:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3183:     %% Create a text file.
 3184:     Name1 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_1.txt"),
 3185:     Line = "The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. 0123456789\n",
 3186:     Len = length(Line),
 3187:     {ok, Handle1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1, [write]),
 3188:     {_, Size1} =
 3189: 	iterate({0, 0},
 3190: 		done,
 3191: 		fun({_, S}) when S >= 128*1024 ->
 3192: 			done;
 3193: 		   ({N, S}) ->
 3194: 			H = integer_to_list(N),
 3195: 			ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Handle1, [H, " ", Line]),
 3196: 			{N + 1, S + length(H) + 1 + Len}
 3197: 		end),
 3198:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle1),
 3199:     %% Make a copy
 3200:     Name2 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_2.txt"),
 3201:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Name1, Name2),
 3202:     %% Concatenate 1
 3203:     Name3 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_3.txt"),
 3204:     {ok, Handle3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, [raw, write, binary]),
 3205:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Name1, Handle3),
 3206:     {ok, Handle2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [read, binary]),
 3207:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Handle2, Handle3),
 3208:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle3),
 3209:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle2),
 3210:     %% Concatenate 2
 3211:     Name4 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_4.txt"),
 3212:     {ok, Handle4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name4, [write, binary]),
 3213:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Name1, Handle4),
 3214:     {ok, Handle5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [raw, read, binary]),
 3215:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Handle5, Handle4),
 3216:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle5),
 3217:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle4),
 3218:     %% %% Just for test of the test
 3219:     %% {ok, Handle2q} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [write, append]),
 3220:     %% ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Handle2q, "q"),
 3221:     %% ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle2q),
 3222:     %% Compare the files
 3223:     {ok, Handle1a} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1, [raw, read]),
 3224:     {ok, Handle2a} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [raw, read]),
 3225:     true = stream_cmp(fd_stream_factory([Handle1a]),
 3226: 		      fd_stream_factory([Handle2a])),
 3227:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Handle1a, 0),
 3228:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Handle2a, 0),
 3229:     {ok, Handle3a} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, [raw, read]),
 3230:     true = stream_cmp(fd_stream_factory([Handle1a, Handle2a]),
 3231: 		      fd_stream_factory([Handle2a])),
 3232:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle1a),
 3233:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle2a),
 3234:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle3a),
 3235:     [] = flush(),
 3236:     ok.
 3237: 
 3238: 
 3239: 
 3240: fd_stream_factory([]) ->
 3241:     [];
 3242: fd_stream_factory([Fd | T] = L) ->
 3243:     fun() ->
 3244: 	    case ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd, 8192) of
 3245: 		{ok, Data} when is_binary(Data) ->
 3246: 		    binary_to_list(Data) ++ fd_stream_factory(L);
 3247: 		{ok, Data} when is_list(Data) ->
 3248: 		    Data ++ fd_stream_factory(L);
 3249: 		eof ->
 3250: 		    fd_stream_factory(T);
 3251: 		{error, _} = Error ->
 3252: 		    Error
 3253: 	    end
 3254:     end.
 3255: 
 3256: 
 3257: 
 3258: stream_cmp(F1, F2) when is_function(F1), is_function(F2) ->
 3259:     stream_cmp(F1(), F2());
 3260: stream_cmp(F, X) when is_function(F) ->
 3261:     stream_cmp(F(), X);
 3262: stream_cmp(X, F) when is_function(F) ->
 3263:     stream_cmp(X, F());
 3264: stream_cmp({error, _} = Error, _) ->
 3265:     Error;
 3266: stream_cmp(_, {error, _} = Error) ->
 3267:     Error;
 3268: stream_cmp([], []) ->
 3269:     true;
 3270: stream_cmp([], [_|_]) ->
 3271:     false;
 3272: stream_cmp([_|_], []) ->
 3273:     false;
 3274: stream_cmp([H | T1], [H | T2]) ->
 3275:     stream_cmp(T1, T2).
 3276: 
 3277: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3278: 
 3279: %% Test the get_cwd(), open(), and copy() file server calls.
 3280: new_slave(_RootDir, Cwd) ->
 3281:     L = "qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm",
 3282:     N = length(L),
 3283:     {ok, Cwd}         = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd(),
 3284:     {error, enotsup}  = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd("C:"), % Unix only testcase
 3285:     {ok, FD1}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt", write),
 3286:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3287:     {ok, FD2}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt",
 3288: 					  [write, append,
 3289: 					   binary, compressed,
 3290: 					   delayed_write,
 3291: 					   {delayed_write, 0, 0},
 3292: 					   read_ahead,
 3293: 					   {read_ahead, 0}]),
 3294:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, L),
 3295:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3296:     {ok, N2}          = ?FILE_MODULE:copy("file1.txt", "file2.txt"),
 3297:     io:format("Size ~p, compressed ~p.~n", [N, N2]),
 3298:     {ok, FD3}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file2.txt",
 3299: 					  [binary, compressed]),
 3300:     %% The file_io_server will translate the binary into a list
 3301:     {ok, L}           = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD3, N+1),
 3302:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3303:     %%
 3304:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:delete("file1.txt"),
 3305:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:delete("file2.txt"),
 3306:     []                = flush(),
 3307:     ok.
 3308: 
 3309: 
 3310: %% Test the get_cwd() and open() file server calls.
 3311: old_slave(_RootDir, Cwd) ->
 3312:     L = "qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm",
 3313:     N = length(L),
 3314:     {ok, Cwd}         = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd(),
 3315:     {error, enotsup}  = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd("C:"), % Unix only testcase
 3316:     {ok, FD1}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt", write),
 3317:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3318:     {ok, FD2}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt",
 3319: 					  [write, binary, compressed]),
 3320:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, L),
 3321:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3322:     {ok, FD3}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt", [write, append]),
 3323:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3324:     {ok, FD4}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt",
 3325: 					  [binary, compressed]),
 3326:     %% The file_io_server will translate the binary into a list
 3327:     {ok, L}           = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD4, N+1),
 3328:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD4),
 3329:     %%
 3330:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:delete("file1.txt"),
 3331:     []                = flush(),
 3332:     ok.
 3333: 
 3334: run_test(Test, Args) ->
 3335:     case (catch apply(?MODULE, Test, Args)) of
 3336: 	{'EXIT', _} = Exit ->
 3337: 	    {done, Exit, get(test_server_loc)};
 3338: 	Result ->
 3339: 	    {done, Result}
 3340:     end.
 3341: 
 3342: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3343: 
 3344: %% Tests the file open option {delayed_write, Size, Delay}.
 3345: 
 3346: delayed_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3347:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3348:     File = filename:join(RootDir, 
 3349: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_delayed_write.txt"),
 3350:     Data1 = "asdfghjkl",
 3351:     Data2 = "qwertyuio",
 3352:     Data3 = "zxcvbnm,.",
 3353:     Size = length(Data1),
 3354:     Size = length(Data2),
 3355:     Size = length(Data3),
 3356:     Data1Data1 = Data1++Data1,
 3357:     Data1Data1Data1 = Data1Data1++Data1,
 3358:     Data1Data1Data1Data1 = Data1Data1++Data1Data1,
 3359:     %%
 3360:     %% Test caching and normal close of non-raw file
 3361:     {ok, Fd1} = 
 3362: 	?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [write, {delayed_write, Size+1, 400}]),
 3363:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1),
 3364:     %% Wait for a reasonable amount of time to check whether the write was
 3365:     %% practically instantaneous or actually delayed.
 3366:     timer:sleep(100),
 3367:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3368:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 1),
 3369:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1), % Data flush on size
 3370:     timer:sleep(100),
 3371:     {ok, Data1Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, bof, 2*Size+1),
 3372:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1),
 3373:     timer:sleep(500), % Wait until data flush on timeout
 3374:     {ok, Data1Data1Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, bof, 3*Size+1),
 3375:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1),
 3376:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1), % Data flush on close
 3377:     timer:sleep(100),
 3378:     {ok, Data1Data1Data1Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, bof, 4*Size+1),
 3379:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 3380:     %%
 3381:     %% Test implicit close through exit by file owning process, 
 3382:     %% raw file, default parameters.
 3383:     Parent = self(),
 3384:     Fun = fun() ->
 3385: 		  Child = self(),
 3386: 		  Test =
 3387: 		      fun () ->
 3388: 			      {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File,
 3389: 							   [raw, write, delayed_write]),
 3390: 			      ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd, Data1),
 3391: 			      Parent ! {Child, wrote},
 3392: 			      receive
 3393: 				  {Parent, continue, Reason} ->
 3394: 				      {ok, Reason}
 3395: 			      end
 3396: 		      end,
 3397: 		  case (catch Test()) of
 3398: 		      {ok, Reason} -> exit(Reason);
 3399: 		      Unknown ->
 3400: 			  exit({Unknown, get(test_server_loc)})
 3401: 		  end
 3402: 	  end,
 3403:     Child1 = spawn(Fun),
 3404:     Mref1 = erlang:monitor(process, Child1),
 3405:     receive 
 3406:         {Child1, wrote} -> 
 3407:             ok;
 3408:         {'DOWN', Mref1, _, _, _} = Down1a ->
 3409:             ct:fail(Down1a)
 3410:     end,
 3411:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3412:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3413:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd3, 1),
 3414:     Child1 ! {Parent, continue, normal},
 3415:     receive 
 3416:         {'DOWN', Mref1, process, Child1, normal} -> 
 3417:             ok;
 3418:         {'DOWN', Mref1, _, _, _} = Down1b ->
 3419:             ct:fail(Down1b)
 3420:     end,
 3421:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3422:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd3, bof, Size+1),
 3423:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 3424:     %%
 3425:     %% The same again, but this time with reason 'kill'.
 3426:     Child2 = spawn(Fun),
 3427:     Mref2 = erlang:monitor(process, Child2),
 3428:     receive 
 3429:         {Child2, wrote} -> 
 3430:             ok;
 3431:         {'DOWN', Mref2, _, _, _} = Down2a ->
 3432:             ct:fail(Down2a)
 3433:     end,
 3434:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3435:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3436:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd4, 1),
 3437:     Child2 ! {Parent, continue, kill},
 3438:     receive 
 3439:         {'DOWN', Mref2, process, Child2, kill} -> 
 3440:             ok;
 3441:         {'DOWN', Mref2, _, _, _} = Down2b ->
 3442:             ct:fail(Down2b)
 3443:     end,
 3444:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3445:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd4, bof, 1),
 3446:     ok  = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 3447:     %%
 3448:     %% Test if file position works with delayed_write
 3449:     {ok, Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, write, 
 3450: 					 delayed_write]),
 3451:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(Fd5),
 3452:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, [Data1|Data2]),
 3453:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3454:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, [Data3]),
 3455:     {ok, Data2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, Size+1),
 3456:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3457:     Data3Data2 = Data3++Data2,
 3458:     {ok, Data3Data2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, 2*Size+1),
 3459:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 3460:     %%
 3461:     [] = flush(),
 3462:     ok.
 3463: 
 3464: 
 3465: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3466: 
 3467: %% Tests the file open option {read_ahead, Size}.
 3468: 
 3469: read_ahead(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3470:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3471:     File = filename:join(RootDir,
 3472: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_read_ahead.txt"),
 3473:     Data1 = "asdfghjkl", % Must be
 3474:     Data2 = "qwertyuio", % same
 3475:     Data3 = "zxcvbnm,.", % length
 3476:     Size = length(Data1),
 3477:     Size = length(Data2),
 3478:     Size = length(Data3),
 3479:     %%
 3480:     %% Test caching of normal non-raw file
 3481:     {ok, Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [write]),
 3482:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, [Data1|Data1]),
 3483:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3484:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read, {read_ahead, 2*Size}]),
 3485:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, Size),
 3486:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(Fd1, Size, Data2),
 3487:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3488:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, Size), % Will read cached data
 3489:     Data2Data2Data2 = Data2++Data2++Data2,
 3490:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(Fd1, eof, Data2Data2Data2),
 3491:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3492:     {ok, Data2Data2Data2} =
 3493: 	?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 3*Size), % Read more than cache buffer
 3494:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 3495:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 3496:     %% Test caching of raw file and default parameters
 3497:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, write]),
 3498:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd3, [Data1|Data1]),
 3499:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3500:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, read_ahead]),
 3501:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd4, Size),
 3502:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(Fd3, Size, Data2),
 3503:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3504:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd4, Size), % Will read cached data
 3505:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 3506:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 3507:     %% Test if the file position works in combination with read_ahead
 3508:     {ok, Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, write, read_ahead]),
 3509:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(Fd5),
 3510:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, [Data1,Data1|Data3]),
 3511:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3512:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, Size),
 3513:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, Data2),
 3514:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3515:     Data1Data2Data3 = Data1++Data2++Data3,
 3516:     {ok, Data1Data2Data3} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, 3*Size+1),
 3517:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 3518: 
 3519:     %% Ensure that a read that draws from both the buffer and the file won't
 3520:     %% return anything wonky.
 3521:     SplitData = << <<(I rem 256)>> || I <- lists:seq(1, 1024) >>,
 3522:     file:write_file(File, SplitData),
 3523:     {ok, Fd6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, binary, {read_ahead, 256}]),
 3524:     {ok, <<1>>} = file:read(Fd6, 1),
 3525:     <<1, Shifted:512/binary, _Rest/binary>> = SplitData,
 3526:     {ok, Shifted} = file:read(Fd6, 512),
 3527: 
 3528:     %%
 3529:     [] = flush(),
 3530:     ok.
 3531: 
 3532: 
 3533: 
 3534: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3535: 
 3536: 
 3537: 
 3538: %% Tests the segmenting of large reads.
 3539: segment_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3540:     Name = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3541: 			 ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_segment_read"),
 3542:     SegSize = 256*1024,
 3543:     SegCnt = SegSize div 4,
 3544:     Cnt = 4 * SegCnt,
 3545:     ok = create_file(Name, Cnt),
 3546:     %% 
 3547:     %% read_file/1
 3548:     %%
 3549:     {ok, Bin} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file(Name),
 3550:     true = verify_bin(Bin, 0, Cnt),
 3551:     %%
 3552:     %% read/2
 3553:     %%
 3554:     %% Not segmented
 3555:     {ok, FD1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3556:     {ok, B1a} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3557:     {ok, B1b} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3558:     {ok, B1c} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3559:     {ok, B1d} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3560:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3561:     true = verify_bin(B1a, 0*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3562:     true = verify_bin(B1b, 1*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3563:     true = verify_bin(B1c, 2*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3564:     true = verify_bin(B1d, 3*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3565:     %%
 3566:     %% Segmented
 3567:     {ok, FD2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3568:     {ok, B2a} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD2, 1*SegSize),
 3569:     {ok, B2b} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD2, 2*SegSize),
 3570:     {ok, B2c} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD2, 2*SegSize),
 3571:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3572:     true = verify_bin(B2a, 0*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3573:     true = verify_bin(B2b, 1*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3574:     true = verify_bin(B2c, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3575:     %%
 3576:     %% pread/3
 3577:     %%
 3578:     {ok, FD3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3579:     %%
 3580:     %% Not segmented
 3581:     {ok, B3d} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 3*SegSize, SegSize),
 3582:     {ok, B3c} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 2*SegSize, SegSize),
 3583:     {ok, B3b} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 1*SegSize, SegSize),
 3584:     {ok, B3a} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 0*SegSize, SegSize),
 3585:     true = verify_bin(B3a, 0*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3586:     true = verify_bin(B3b, 1*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3587:     true = verify_bin(B3c, 2*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3588:     true = verify_bin(B3d, 3*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3589:     %%
 3590:     %% Segmented
 3591:     {ok, B3g} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 3*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3592:     {ok, B3f} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3593:     {ok, B3e} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3594:     true = verify_bin(B3e, 0*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3595:     true = verify_bin(B3f, 1*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3596:     true = verify_bin(B3g, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3597:     %%
 3598:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3599:     %%
 3600:     %% pread/2
 3601:     %%
 3602:     {ok, FD5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3603:     %%
 3604:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3605:     %% | 4 | 3 | 2 | 1 |
 3606:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3607:     %% <       ^       >
 3608:     {ok, [B5d, B5c, B5b, B5a]} =
 3609: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{3*SegSize, SegSize},
 3610: 				 {2*SegSize, SegSize},
 3611: 				 {1*SegSize, SegSize},
 3612: 				 {0*SegSize, SegSize}]),
 3613:     true = verify_bin(B5a, 0*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3614:     true = verify_bin(B5b, 1*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3615:     true = verify_bin(B5c, 2*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3616:     true = verify_bin(B5d, 3*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3617:     %%
 3618:     %% +---+-------+-------+
 3619:     %% | 3 |   2   |   1   |
 3620:     %% +---+-------+-------+
 3621:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3622:     {ok, [B5g, B5f, B5e]} =
 3623: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{3*SegSize, 2*SegSize},
 3624: 				 {1*SegSize, 2*SegSize},
 3625: 				 {0*SegSize, 1*SegSize}]),
 3626:     true = verify_bin(B5e, 0*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3627:     true = verify_bin(B5f, 1*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3628:     true = verify_bin(B5g, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3629:     %%
 3630:     %%
 3631:     %% +-------+-----------+
 3632:     %% |   2   |     1     |
 3633:     %% +-------+-----------+
 3634:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3635:     {ok, [B5i, B5h]} =
 3636: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{2*SegSize, 3*SegSize},
 3637: 				 {0*SegSize, 2*SegSize}]),
 3638:     true = verify_bin(B5h, 0*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3639:     true = verify_bin(B5i, 2*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3640:     %%
 3641:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3642:     %% |   3   | 2 | 1 |
 3643:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3644:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3645:     {ok, [B5l, B5k, B5j]} =
 3646: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{3*SegSize, 1*SegSize},
 3647: 				 {2*SegSize, 1*SegSize},
 3648: 				 {0*SegSize, 2*SegSize}]),
 3649:     true = verify_bin(B5j, 0*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3650:     true = verify_bin(B5k, 2*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3651:     true = verify_bin(B5l, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3652:     %%
 3653:     %% Real time response time test.
 3654:     %%
 3655:     Req = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(17,
 3656: 					[{2*SegSize, 2*SegSize},
 3657: 					 {0*SegSize, 2*SegSize}])),
 3658:     {{ok, _}, Comment} =
 3659: 	response_analysis(?FILE_MODULE, pread, [FD5, Req]),
 3660:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD5),
 3661:     %%
 3662:     [] = flush(),
 3663:     {comment, Comment}.
 3664: 
 3665: 
 3666: 
 3667: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3668: 
 3669: 
 3670: 
 3671: %% Tests the segmenting of large writes.
 3672: segment_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3673:     Name = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3674: 			 ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_segment_write"),
 3675:     SegSize = 256*1024,
 3676:     SegCnt = SegSize div 4,
 3677:     Cnt = 4 * SegCnt,
 3678:     Bin = create_bin(0, Cnt),
 3679:     %%
 3680:     %% write/2
 3681:     %%
 3682:     %% Not segmented
 3683:     {ok, FD1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3684:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3685:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3686:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3687:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3688:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3689:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3690:     %%
 3691:     %% Segmented
 3692:     {ok, FD2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3693:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3694:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)),
 3695:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3696:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3697:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3698:     %%
 3699:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3700:     %% |   |   |   |   |
 3701:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3702:     %% <       ^       >
 3703:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3704: 			   subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3705: 			   subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3706: 			   subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)]),
 3707:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3708:     %%
 3709:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3710:     %% |   |       |   |
 3711:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3712:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3713:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3714: 			   subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3715: 			   subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)]),
 3716:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3717:     %%
 3718:     %% +-------+-------+
 3719:     %% |       |       |
 3720:     %% +-------+-------+
 3721:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3722:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3723: 			   subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 2*SegSize)]),
 3724:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3725:     %%
 3726:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3727:     %% |       |   |   |
 3728:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3729:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3730:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3731: 			   subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3732: 			   subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)]),
 3733:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3734:     %%
 3735:     %% pwrite/3
 3736:     %%
 3737:     %% Not segmented
 3738:     {ok, FD3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3739:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 3*SegSize,
 3740: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3741:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 2*SegSize,
 3742: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3743:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 1*SegSize,
 3744: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3745:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 0*SegSize,
 3746: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3747:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3748:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3749:     %%
 3750:     %% Segmented
 3751:     {ok, FD4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3752:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD4, 3*SegSize,
 3753: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3754:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD4, 1*SegSize,
 3755: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)),
 3756:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD4, 0*SegSize,
 3757: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3758:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD4),
 3759:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3760: 
 3761: 
 3762: 
 3763:     %%
 3764:     %% pwrite/2
 3765:     %%
 3766:     %% Not segmented
 3767:     {ok, FD5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3768:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{3*SegSize,
 3769: 				    subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3770:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{2*SegSize,
 3771: 				    subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3772:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{1*SegSize,
 3773: 				    subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3774:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{0*SegSize,
 3775: 				    subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3776:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD5),
 3777:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3778:     %%
 3779:     %% Segmented
 3780:     {ok, FD6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3781:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD6, [{3*SegSize,
 3782: 				    subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3783:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD6, [{1*SegSize,
 3784: 				    subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}]),
 3785:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD6, [{0*SegSize,
 3786: 				    subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3787:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD6),
 3788:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3789:     %%
 3790:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3791:     %% | 4 | 3 | 2 | 1 |
 3792:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3793:     %% <       ^       >
 3794:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{3*SegSize,
 3795: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3796: 			    {2*SegSize,
 3797: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3798: 			    {1*SegSize,
 3799: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3800: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3801: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3802:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3803:     %%
 3804:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3805:     %% | 3 |   2   | 1 |
 3806:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3807:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3808:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{3*SegSize,
 3809: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3810: 			    {1*SegSize,
 3811: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)},
 3812: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3813: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3814:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3815:     %%
 3816:     %% +-------+-------+
 3817:     %% |   2   |   1   |
 3818:     %% +-------+-------+
 3819:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3820:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{2*SegSize,
 3821: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 2*SegSize)},
 3822: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3823: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}]),
 3824:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3825:     %%
 3826:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3827:     %% |   3   | 2 | 1 |
 3828:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3829:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3830:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{3*SegSize,
 3831: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3832: 			    {2*SegSize,
 3833: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3834: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3835: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}]),
 3836:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3837:     %%
 3838:     %% Real time response time test.
 3839:     %%
 3840:     {ok, FD7} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3841:     Req = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(17,
 3842: 					[{2*SegSize, 
 3843: 					  subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 2*SegSize)},
 3844: 					 {0*SegSize,
 3845: 					  subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}])),
 3846:     {ok, Comment} =
 3847: 	response_analysis(?FILE_MODULE, pwrite, [FD7, Req]),
 3848:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD7),
 3849:     %%
 3850:     [] = flush(),
 3851:     {comment, Comment}.
 3852: 
 3853: 
 3854: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3855: 
 3856: %% Test Dets special indirect pread.
 3857: ipread(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3858:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3859:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [raw, binary]),
 3860:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [raw]),
 3861:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [binary]),
 3862:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, []),
 3863:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [ram, binary]),
 3864:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [ram]),
 3865:     %%
 3866:     [] = flush(),
 3867:     ok.
 3868: 
 3869: ipread_int(Dir, ModeList) ->
 3870:     Name =
 3871: 	filename:join(Dir, 
 3872: 		      lists:flatten([?MODULE_STRING, "_ipread",
 3873: 				     lists:map(fun (X) ->
 3874: 						       ["_", atom_to_list(X)]
 3875: 					       end,
 3876: 					       ModeList)])),
 3877:     io:format("ipread_int<~p, ~p>~n", [Name, ModeList]),
 3878:     {Conv, Sizeof} =
 3879: 	case lists:member(binary, ModeList) of
 3880: 	    true ->
 3881: 		{fun (Bin) when is_binary(Bin) -> Bin;
 3882: 		     (List) when is_list(List) -> list_to_binary(List)
 3883: 		 end, 
 3884: 		 fun erlang:byte_size/1};
 3885: 	    false ->
 3886: 		{fun (Bin) when is_binary(Bin) -> binary_to_list(Bin);
 3887: 		     (List) when is_list(List) -> List
 3888: 		 end, 
 3889: 		 fun erlang:length/1}
 3890: 	end,
 3891:     Pos = 4711,
 3892:     Data = Conv("THE QUICK BROWN FOX JUMPS OVER A LAZY DOG"),
 3893:     Size = Sizeof(Data),
 3894:     Init = Conv("                 "),
 3895:     SizeInit = Sizeof(Init),
 3896:     Head = Conv(<<Size:32/big-unsigned, Pos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3897:     Filler = Conv(bytes($ , Pos-SizeInit-Sizeof(Head))),
 3898:     Size1 = Size+1,
 3899:     SizePos = Size+Pos,
 3900:     %%
 3901:     {ok, FD} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, read | ModeList]),
 3902:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(FD),
 3903:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Init),
 3904:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Head),
 3905:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Filler),
 3906:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Data),
 3907:     %% Correct read
 3908:     {ok, {Size, Pos, Data}} =
 3909: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, infinity),
 3910:     %% Invalid header - size > max
 3911:     eof =
 3912: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size-1),
 3913:     %% Data block protudes over eof
 3914:     ok =
 3915: 	?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD, SizeInit, 
 3916: 			    <<Size1:32/big-unsigned, 
 3917: 			      Pos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3918:     {ok, {Size1, Pos, Data}} =
 3919: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size1),
 3920:     %% Data block outside file
 3921:     ok =
 3922: 	?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD, SizeInit, 
 3923: 			    <<Size:32/big-unsigned, 
 3924: 			      SizePos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3925:     {ok, {Size, SizePos, eof}} =
 3926: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size),
 3927:     %% Zero size
 3928:     ok =
 3929: 	?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD, SizeInit, 
 3930: 			    <<0:32/big-unsigned, 
 3931: 			      Pos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3932:     {ok, {0, Pos, eof}} =
 3933: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size),
 3934:     %% Invalid header - protudes over eof
 3935:     eof =
 3936: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, 
 3937: 					Pos+Size-(Sizeof(Head)-1), 
 3938: 					infinity),
 3939:     %% Header not even in file
 3940:     eof =
 3941: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, Pos+Size, infinity),
 3942:     %%
 3943:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD),
 3944:     ok.
 3945: 
 3946: 
 3947: 
 3948: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3949: 
 3950: %% Tests interleaved read and writes.
 3951: interleaved_read_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3952:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3953:     File =
 3954: 	filename:join(Dir, ?MODULE_STRING++"interleaved_read_write.txt"),
 3955:     {ok,F1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [write]),
 3956:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F1, "data---r1."), % 10 chars each
 3957:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F1, "data---r2."),
 3958:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F1, "data---r3."),
 3959:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F1),
 3960:     {ok,F2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read, write]),
 3961:     {ok, "data---r1."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F2, 10),
 3962:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F2, "data---w2."),
 3963:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F2),
 3964:     {ok,F3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3965:     {ok, "data---r1."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 10),
 3966:     {ok, "data---w2."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 10),
 3967:     {ok, "data---r3."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 10),
 3968:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 1),
 3969:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F2),
 3970:     %%
 3971:     [] = flush(),
 3972:     ok.
 3973:

 3975: 
 3976: %% OTP-5814. eval/consult/script return correct line numbers.
 3977: otp_5814(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3978:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3979:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "otp_5814"),
 3980:     Path = [PrivDir],
 3981:     ok = file:write_file(File, <<"{a,b,c}.
 3982:                                         a.
 3983: b.
 3984: c.
 3985: {d,e,
 3986:  [}.">>),
 3987:     {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:eval(File),
 3988:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:consult(File),
 3989:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:path_consult(Path, File),
 3990:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:path_eval(Path, File),
 3991:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:script(File),
 3992:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:path_script(Path, File),
 3993: 
 3994:  ok = file:write_file(File, <<>>),
 3995:  {error, {1,file,undefined_script}} = file:path_script(Path, File),
 3996: 
 3997:     %% The error is not propagated...
 3998:  ok = file:write_file(File, <<"a.
 3999:                                         b.
 4000: 1/0.">>),
 4001:     {error, {3, file, {error, badarith, _}}} = file:eval(File),
 4002: 
 4003: ok = file:write_file(File, <<"erlang:raise(throw, apa, []).">>),
 4004: {error, {1, file, {throw, apa, _}}} = file:eval(File),
 4005: 
 4006: file:delete(File),
 4007: ok.
